entry.source: 主人公は皆と別れて自室で休みます{F801}
entry.target: 主人公は皆と別れて自室で休みます{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Jonathan parted ways with you.{F801}{F802}〉 Walter parted ways with you.{F801}{F802}〉 Isabeau parted ways with you.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Jonathan parted ways with you.{F801}{F802}〉 Walter parted ways with you.{F801}{F802}〉 Isabeau parted ways with you.{F801}
